description:
When Heiji arrives at Nihonbashi, the scene of the drug deal, he finds three people wearing or holding white roses. Heiji trasmits images of the three people to Conan using his cell phone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Conan and Heiji`s Code of Love (Part 2)
Conan et Heiji, le code de l`amour (2e partie)
Conan to Heiji: Koi no Angou (Kouhen)
コナンと平次 恋の暗号 (後編)
